Title: Pomodoro Technique
Description: The Pomodoro Technique is a time management method developed by Francesco Cirillo in the late 1980s
Format: 25 minute study period followed by a 5 minute break

Title: Desktime Variation
Description: Developed by Tim Metz and desktime.com, it is a medium length study format
Format: 52 minutes of work followed by 17 minutes of break

Title: Ultradian Rhythm
Description: Pioneered by sleep researcher Nathan Klietman, this is a long format study technique
Format: 90 minutes of work followed by 30 minutes of break
